Message.name: Attack target
Message.Invoke:
(switch ; If ordered to attack ourselves, hilarity ensues (eq (objGetTarget gSender) gSource) (objFireEvent gSource "OrderAttackSelf")
; Attack the target (objGetTarget gSender) (block Nil (objCommunicate gSource gSender 1 (objGetTarget gSender)) (objSendMessage gSender gSource "Auton order acknowledged") )
(objSendMessage gSender gSource "Unable to comply") )

Message.name: Form up
Message.Invoke: (block Nil (objCommunicate gSource gSender 13) (objSendMessage gSender gSource "Auton order acknowledged") )

Message.name: Wait
Message.Invoke: (block Nil (objCommunicate gSource gSender 14) (objSendMessage gSender gSource "Auton order acknowledged") )

Events.OrderAttackSelf:
(block Nil ; Malfunction causes auton to attack player (shpSetController gSource Nil) (objSetSovereign gSource &svDefectiveAuton;) (shpCancelOrders gSource) (shpOrder gSource 'attack gSender)
(objSendMessage gSender gSource "200A: AI.error.safety_module_failure") )

(block Nil ; Malfunction causes auton to attack player (shpSetController gSource Nil) (objSetSovereign gSource &svDefectiveAuton;) (shpCancelOrders gSource) (shpOrder gSource 'attack gSender)
(objSendMessage gSender gSource "300D: AI.error.safety_module_failure") )

Default.desc: You are docked with a 330M mule auton.

Events.OrderAttackSelf: (block Nil (objCommunicate gSource gSender 14) (objSendMessage gSender gSource "1M self-destruct activated") (sysAddObjTimerEvent 90 gSource "OrderSelfDestruct") )
Events.OrderSelfDestruct:
(block Nil (sysCreateWeaponFire &vtBlastExplosion4; (list Nil 'explosion Nil "self-destructing 1M battle auton" 0x00) (objGetPos gSource) 0 0 Nil 'detonateNow )
(objDestroy gSource) )

ItemType.name: AutoSentinel®| AutoSentinels®
ItemType.description: For around 500 credits, OmniDefense Systems' AutoSentinel keeps you and your loved ones safe from harm. NOTE: For professional security needs, order the 1M battle auton.
ItemType.Invoke:
(block (auton) ; Create the auton (setq auton (sysCreateShip &scAutoSentinel; (objGetPos gSource) &svFriendlyAuton; "auton" ) )
; Escort ship (shpOrderEscort auton gSource)
; Identify the item (itmSetKnown gItem)
; Welcome message (objSendMessage gSource Nil "AutoSentinel® v2.01 online")
; Remove the item from the player's list (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) )
